Class LoggingUserManager

Namespace
Project.Api.Auth
Assembly
Project.Api.dll

Custom implementation of UserManager<TUser> that adds logging capabilities for user account events such as password resets.

public class LoggingUserManager : UserManager<User>, IDisposable

LoggingUserManager(IUserStore<User>, IOptions<IdentityOptions>, IPasswordHasher<User>, IEnumerable<IUserValidator<User>>, IEnumerable<IPasswordValidator<User>>, ILookupNormalizer, IdentityErrorDescriber, IServiceProvider, ILogger<UserManager<User>>, IUserLoggerService)

Initializes a new instance of the LoggingUserManager class.

public LoggingUserManager(IUserStore<User> store, IOptions<IdentityOptions> optionsAccessor, IPasswordHasher<User> passwordHasher, IEnumerable<IUserValidator<User>> userValidators, IEnumerable<IPasswordValidator<User>> passwordValidators, ILookupNormalizer keyNormalizer, IdentityErrorDescriber errors, IServiceProvider services, ILogger<UserManager<User>> logger, IUserLoggerService userLoggerService)

Parameters

store IUserStore<User>

The user store used to persist user information.

optionsAccessor IOptions<IdentityOptions>

Provides access to identity options.

passwordHasher IPasswordHasher<User>

Hasher used to hash user passwords.

userValidators IEnumerable<IUserValidator<User>>

List of user validators.

passwordValidators IEnumerable<IPasswordValidator<User>>

List of password validators.

keyNormalizer ILookupNormalizer

Used to normalize keys for consistent lookup.

errors IdentityErrorDescriber

Provides identity error descriptions.

services IServiceProvider

Service provider for dependency injection.

logger ILogger<UserManager<User>>

The logger used for logging internal identity operations.

userLoggerService IUserLoggerService

Custom user logging service for tracking account events.

Methods

ResetPasswordAsync(User, string, string)

Resets the password for a user using the provided reset token and logs the operation if successful.

public override Task<IdentityResult> ResetPasswordAsync(User user, string token, string newPassword)

Parameters

user User

The user whose password is being reset.

token string

The password reset token.

newPassword string

The new password to set for the user.

Returns

Task<IdentityResult>

An IdentityResult indicating whether the operation succeeded.

Exceptions

Exception

Thrown when the user email is invalid or null.
